content:
@RalfJ Congratulations for getting your PhD!
I hope it won't mean you'll stop contributing to Rust and working on stacked borrows :stuck_out_tongue_wink:

https://twitter.com/HerrDreyer/status/1302196178302439424?s=19

My student Ralf Jung is now a PhD! Here's the final version of his thesis, which encompasses fantastic work on Iris, RustBelt, and Stacked Borrows, and with a greatly expanded presentation of the RustBelt verification and some aspects of Iris. I love it. https://people.mpi-sws.org/~jung/phd/thesis-screen.pdf

- Derek Dreyer (@HerrDreyer)

@Elichai Turkel thanks :)

I hope it won't mean you'll stop contributing to Rust and working on stacked borrows :stuck_out_tongue:

I hope so, too ;)
